content: I would like to know if it is possiable to get a waiver for dependents. I went and talked to a recruiter where i live at and he said that i would have to go resevres if i wante dto be in the navy cause i have too many dependents but another recruiter at the same office said i could get a wavier i want to know if this is true or not. i have 4 kids and my husband and he was in the navy and got out and now i want to join.

content: You can put in for a waiver, but 4 kids + 1 husband = 5 dependants. It will most likely not happen (trying to be honest with you). Recruiting is doing well right now and they will turn down as many waivers as possible.
